auth.serverConnectionError: Unable to connect to server. Please ensure the server is running

bid.bidSuccess: Bid successful! Please wait for the requester to select a trader.
bid.pleaseLoginToBid: Please login to place a bid
bid.alreadyBid: You have already placed a bid

transaction.waitingForSelection: Waiting for requester to select trader
transaction.bothSigned: Both parties signed! USDT released automatically.
transaction.signatureSuccessful: Signature successful. Waiting for counterparty signature.
transaction.paymentNotReceived: Payment not received notification sent. The other party can re-upload proof.
transaction.multisigInfoNotFound: Multisig order info not found. Please refresh and try again.

error.invalidAddress: Scanned result is not a valid Ethereum address

empty.getStarted: Make a payment to get started!
empty.emptyScan: Scan result is empty, please try again

welcome.title: Welcome to TagPay
welcome.subtitle: The social way to pay and trade stablecoins.
welcome.loginDescription: Use Privy wallet login, supports Twitter account login. First login will automatically create a wallet.

wallet.clickToConnect: Click to connect wallet (Twitter login supported)

fiat.fillAllRequired: Please fill in all required fields (name, account number, bank name)

otc.waitingForTraderPayUSDT: Waiting for trader to pay USDT...
otc.pleaseConnectWalletToPay: Please connect wallet to pay USDT
otc.waitingForFiatPayment: USDT in escrow, waiting for counterparty to pay fiat and sign...
otc.waitingForInitiatorPayFiat: USDT in escrow, waiting for initiator to pay fiat and sign...
otc.checkAndResubmit: Claimed payment not received, please check and resubmit payment record
otc.usdtDepositedPayFiat: USDT deposited, please pay fiat and sign
otc.proofUploadedWaitingConfirm: Proof uploaded, waiting for counterparty to confirm receipt and release USDT.
otc.proofUploadedWaitingInitiator: Proof uploaded, waiting for initiator to confirm receipt and release USDT.
otc.markedPaidPleaseVerify: Counterparty has marked payment and uploaded proof, please verify receipt and release USDT.
otc.markedPaidPleaseVerifyInitiator: Initiator has marked payment and uploaded proof, please verify receipt and release USDT.
otc.paymentErrorApplyRefund: Payment error? Apply for asset refund (requires counterparty signature)
otc.refundRequestedWaitingSignature: Refund requested. Waiting for signature, USDT will be returned to your account.
otc.refundRequestedWaitingSignatureInitiator: Refund requested. Waiting for signature, USDT will be returned to your account.
otc.initiatorRequestedRefund: Initiator has requested asset refund (twice did not receive fiat). Please agree to sign to complete refund, USDT will be returned to initiator account.
otc.traderRequestedRefund: Trader has requested asset refund (twice did not receive fiat). Please agree to sign to complete refund, USDT will be returned to trader account.
otc.traderRequestedRefundInitiator: Trader has requested asset refund (twice did not receive fiat). Please agree to sign to complete refund, USDT will be returned to trader account.
otc.initiatorRequestedRefundTrader: Initiator has requested asset refund (twice did not receive fiat). Please agree to sign to complete refund, USDT will be returned to initiator account.
otc.twiceClaimedNotReceived: Counterparty has twice claimed not received fiat, initiating asset refund process, please wait...
otc.twiceClaimedNotReceivedInitiator: Initiator has twice claimed not received fiat, initiating asset refund process, please wait...
otc.selectTraderAndLockUSDT: Select This Trader and Lock USDT

bidList.noBidsYet: No one has placed a bid yet
bidList.waitingForBids: Waiting for traders to place bids...

reply.addCommentOrImage: Please add comment content or upload image

modal.postToTimeline: Post request to your X timeline
modal.enterEthereumAddress: Enter Ethereum address directly for payment
modal.invalidEthereumAddress: Please enter a valid Ethereum address (starts with 0x, 42 characters)
modal.tweetContent: Tweet Content (will be posted to X)
modal.tweetContentPlaceholder: Write tweet content... (e.g., Requesting 100 USDT for 165000 NGN on VenmoOTC! #DeFi #OTC)
modal.backendWillUseTwitterToken: Backend will use your Twitter accessToken to post tweet
modal.ifEmptyAutoGenerate: ⚠️ If left empty, backend will automatically generate tweet content
modal.selectRecipientOrAddress: Please select recipient or enter recipient address
modal.cannotPayYourself: Cannot pay yourself, please select another recipient
modal.cannotPayOwnAddress: Cannot pay to your own address
modal.scanToPay: Scan to pay USDT, USDC or other supported assets.
